name: restart-service
description: Restart a specific service or all services
instructions:
Help the user restart services in the Aura monorepo.

1. Ask which service to restart (server, agent, ui, redis, or all)
2. If specific service:
   - Run: docker compose restart <service>
   - Wait for health check to pass (if applicable)
   - Verify with curl to service endpoint
3. If all services:
   - Run: make down
   - Run: make dev
   - Wait for all health checks
4. After restart:
   - Show service status: docker compose ps
   - Run health check on affected services
   - Tail logs briefly to ensure no errors: docker compose logs --tail=20 <service>
5. Explain when to restart vs rebuild:
   - Restart: Code changes with hot reload, config changes
   - Rebuild: Dependency changes, Dockerfile changes
